source_comments: There’s no way they could extend it with more episodes. Korra was made on a string budget and it really shows.

Now if you don’t think epitaph works at all times then he’d probably be killed.

It’s no use actually jumping into the minutia of techniques on manga because they’re all written to serve one thing: the plot. Stuff is pulled from characters assess whenever necessary. Once you realise that, you also realise there’s very little actual substance and it’s mostly style.

Because the move was thought of as an ace for the Itachi fight narratively speaking. For dramatic purposes kirin was revealed as a wow moment for the Itachi fight and using it before that point would take away from the mystery. You see the real reason is meta instead of in universe.

You’re right the actual reason is the idea of tailed beasts and jinchuriki wasn’t thought of by Kishimoto back then, but retroactively I would say the cultures are just different. Some village use the number of tails for their beast name others use the actual name that trickled down from history, just different cultures using different names.
